data.title: Ethiopian Airlines Nairobi Office in Kenya 1
data.meta_description: Make the Ethiopian Airlines Nairobi Office in Kenya your one-stop shop whenever you get stuck completing your pre-flight procedures online. Besides this, […]
data.text:
Make the Ethiopian Airlines Nairobi Office in Kenya your one-stop shop whenever you get stuck completing your pre-flight procedures online. Besides this, you must know that group reservations and bookings for unaccompanied minors and pets might take some of your extra time. In such a situation, the office representatives can enlighten you about certain regulations, help you book tickets, and make any changes if required. Also, you can ask for discounted airfares special offers and learn to use miles before stepping inside your assigned terminal. Below, we have mentioned different social media handles, official addresses, and contact details that can help you make connections with the office staff.

Contact Info of Ethiopian Airlines Nairobi Office in Kenya

Address: Starehe, Bruce House, Nairobi Central Muindi Mbingu St, Standard St, Nairobi, Kenya

Phone Number: +254701223493

Fax: +254 02 2219007

Working Hours: Monday – Friday : 8:30 am – 5:00 pm; Saturday : 9:00 am – 1:00 pm

Email: nbores@ethiopianairlines.com / nbocto@ethiopianairlines.com

Airport Name: Jomo Kenyatta International Airport

Airport Address: Embakasi, Nairobi, Kenya

Airport Contact Number: +25420822111

Map:

Ethiopian Airlines Head Office Contact Details

Address: Bole International Airport, Addis Ababa, Ethiopia

Contact Number: +251115178054

Fax: +251-11- 661 1474

Email: MeridB@ethiopianairlines.com

Official website: https://www.ethiopianairlines.com

Plane / Aircraft Types

The Ethiopian Airlines Customer Care handles the following inquiries:

To get insights about your upcoming air travel, connect with the Ethiopian Airlines Nairobi Office in Kenya. Not only this, feel free to visit the office after a successful trip with the airline. Share your feedback and suggestions with the office representatives.

Travelers May Ask!
